Si Kuat dan Mandiri

Picture

Alya itu orangnya asik, humble, mandiri, kuat. Dia juga canti banget, lucu, rada bego, kaya anak kecil, ngeselin kek babi, suka nakut-nakutin, kadang dia jahat kek iblis tapi aslinya dia BAAIIKKK BGT. I am very happy to know her, she makes my days always happy.


I Really Love Her as A Best Friend
